column1: Funeral services will be held Monday June 15
column2: 2015 at 2:00PM from the Finch-Cochran Funeral Home with the Rev. Matthew McDaniel officiating. music will be provided by
column3: Doug Simonds. Interment will follow in the Crestlawn Cemetery .  The family will receive friends Sunday June 14
column4: 2015 at the Finch-Cochran Funeral Home from 6:00PM-9:00PM.
